name: Rich Moore
info:
• 简体中文名: 里奇·摩尔
  • 别名: リッチ・ムーア
  • 性别: 男
  • 生日: 1963-05-10
  • 职业: Animation director, film director
  • 出生地: United States
detail: Rich Moore (born May 10, 1963) is an American animation director and a creative partner in both Rough Draft Studios and Walt Disney Animation Studios, best known for his work on The Simpsons, Futurama, Wreck-It Ralph and Zootopia.
